mapper.update: update eco_fegw_module set bizCode = #{bizcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bizName = #{bizname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, moduleType = #{moduletype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, moduleName = #{modulename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ext1 = #{ext1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ext2 = #{ext2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ext3 = #{ext3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updateTime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, bizCode, bizName, moduleType, moduleName, remark, ext1, ext2, ext3, creator, createTime, modifier, updateTime from eco_fegw_module where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
